start.speaker: Alessandro
start.text: Hello and well met. This place is beautiful, isn't it?

who_are_you.speaker: Alessandro
who_are_you.text: I am but a humble sinner. My name is Alessandro.

why_are_you_here.speaker: Alessandro
why_are_you_here.text: I am on a pilgrimage. My path goes beyond, down the way you just came.

choices.speaker: Player
choices.text: No, why are you here specifically?

jester_response.speaker: Alessandro
jester_response.text: I am a jester too. But listen to my words.

why_here_specific.speaker: Alessandro
why_here_specific.text: You are a curious one, huh? I suppose my maker placed me here to instruct you.

seem_like_traveler.speaker: Alessandro
seem_like_traveler.text: You, you seem like a traveler. Where are you headed?

confirm_pilgrimage.speaker: Alessandro
confirm_pilgrimage.text: Ah, so you are also on a pilgrimage?

node_1743375095664.speaker: Alessandro
node_1743375095664.text: So you know what you're doing then? Wonderful. I hope you are transformed.

node_1743375154069.speaker: Alessandro
node_1743375154069.text: Within you. Let this journey serve as an instruction. Learn to read your spiritual landscape here, and you can read any landscape. Yes, even outside the game.

node_1743375239756.speaker: Alessandro
node_1743375239756.text: Fare well, fellow pilgrim. God be with you.
